Articles.Content: Minmus, I doubt is a comet, but probably a captured object yes

The issue with people posting so fast is mostly one of the thread moving so quickly it is impossible to keep up with what's going on.

Better to move along at a nice easy pace so everyone can follow along.

Besides, now you all have something to do.

This is what I am trying to accomplish here, allowing a loose topic thread to remain as a general topic thread and eliminate the roleplaying and random nonsense posting that is cluttering it up.

This is what I am trying to accomplish here, allowing a loose topic thread to remain as a general topic thread and eliminate the roleplaying and random nonsense posting that is cluttering it up.

Is there not another thread people could use for that? If we had one it would help cut down on the nonsense in here.

Okay, sometimes you just have a head full of random nonsense and such. Rather than posting it in serious places you'll place it here; a saftey valve thread for all the stupid crap. It's one horribly messed up thread that keeps the others clean. You just dump your insanity here so you can be sane elsewhere.

Inner fangrrrrllll escaped, sorry.
*face melts*

I just woke up, 2 pages of Laythecat and 0.20 IS OUT IMMA GEET IT NAO

Anyway Odin, did you close the Laythecat thread because it got too big? Or was it because some people kept making it spiral out of control? Just so we know how to avoid the next one (if possible).

Both, actually.

When threads get really big they become difficult to moderate.

But there was also that annoying tendancy for the thread to jump some 5-10 pages in the span of a few hours, a posting rate worthy of spam infactions.

Heh, I find the fact that Laythecat was the most active thread I have ever been on is amusing. All the other ones take about an hour to get another reply, but this one gets 5 pages in an hour!

EDIT: I also find the fact that the main server is (probably) down because of all the downloads. But oh well, I have my new Adventure Time eps
